column4: i am currently having boot problems, and have for nearly a week. the boot completely stops in its tracks. the suspects of this crime are: the update i did before i rebooted 6 days ago, and the console configuration file. can someone help me with this? the last two lines given in the boot are:
* Setting console screen modes and fonts
Please don't flood, use http://paste.ubuntu.com to paste, don't use Enter as punctuation.
